name: F.R.D.D. (five rounds dodging darts)
description:
This i a game i made out of boredom. 

Basicaly it's shitty FNAF x btd6 crossover. Not sure if i m gonna update it (gonna focus on creating other projects).

I didnt do thit game during game jam. This shouldnt count.

In fact i made this game in week, but some time before game jam.

Unexpectably, i didnt have time to work on game jam game (when i m writing this, i lost 3 days) and i wont be able to work on Feb game jam 2022. I will compete again during august tho.
